mapper.select: select member_id, member_pw, member_name, member_email, salt, member_status, score, member_register_time from member where member_id = #{member_id} and member_pw = #{member_pw} and member_status = 'ACTIVE'
mapper.insert: insert into member (member_id, member_pw, member_name, member_email, salt) value (#{member_id}, #{member_pw}, #{member_name}, #{member_email}, #{salt})
mapper.select: select exists (select * from member where member_id = #{member_id})
